pages.title: Follow the Money trail
pages.subtitle: Revenue vs. estimated spend across the 4-layer AI stack
pages.description: Interactive dashboard tracking $400B in AI infrastructure spending. Visualize revenue performance, fulfillment rates, and estimated spend across chip makers, GPU cloud providers, LLMs, and distribution layers.

pages.title: The $1.4 Trillion AI Mystery: Rethinking How Value Flows
pages.subtitle: Outcome-Based Pricing Research
pages.description: From Sam Altman's candid response to a $1.4T question to practical outcome-based pricing models. How hybrid approaches could realign incentives across the AI stack and make everyone profitable.
